passage.title: Children's Day
passage.paragraph: June 1st is Children's Day. It is our own festival. On that day, the children all over the world don't go to school. We have lots of fun!

Today is Children's Day. My parents take me to the park in the center of the city. There are many children in it. They also come here on their vacation. And I meet my friend Yao Ying, then we go boating. We enjoy ourselves!
